post.description: Create new `Roadmap`. `name` field is required.  `For Example {'name': 'My first roadmap'}`
Get single `Roadmap`. by `roadmapId`. For Example `{'roadmapViewType': 'list'}` or `{'roadmapViewType': ''}`

parameters.name: roadmapId
parameters.description: The roadmap that needs to be fetched

put.description: A user can add two types of field - Text, List. For text field send -  `{'roadmapId': '5e4e519b56ed8136fe56efd1','field':{'name':'test','type':'text','label':'Test','placeholder':'Test'}`. For list field send - `{'roadmapId': '5e567245f5254814130a885c','field': {'name': 'test','type': 'list','label': 'Test','placeholder': 'Test','options': ['option1','option2']}}`

A user can edit two types of field - Text, List. For text field send `{'roadmapId': '5e60d05558a01f3c812024f3','field': {'fieldId': '5e60d6046a776b41d483012d','name': 'test','type': 'text','label': 'Test','placeholder': 'Test'}}`. For list field send - `{'roadmapId': '5e60d05558a01f3c812024f3','field': {'fieldId': '5e60d6046a776b41d483012d','name': 'test','type': 'list','label': 'Test','placeholder': 'Test','options': [{'_id': '5e60d6046a776b41d483012e','optionsValue': 'option1'},{'_id': '5e60d6046a776b41d483012f','optionsValue': 'option2'}]}}`

parameters.name: roadmapId
parameters.description: The roadmap that needs to be delete

delete.description: Pass `'roadmap'` in action field to delete a roadmap.  `For Example {'action': 'roadmap'}`

parameters.name: roadmapId
parameters.description: The roadmap that needs to be delete

post.summary: Get roadmap configuration by roadmap id

parameters.name: roadmapId
parameters.description: The roadmap that needs to be fetched

delete.description: Pass `'share'` in action field to delete a share roadmap or `'shareuser'` and userId to delete a field from the share roadmap. `userId` is required to delete a field from the share roadmap.

parameters.name: shareId
parameters.description: The share roadmap that needs to be delete

delete.description: Pass `'share'` in action field to delete a share roadmap or `'shareuser'` and userId to delete a field from the share roadmap. `userId` is required to delete a field from the share roadmap.

parameters.name: shareId
parameters.description: The share roadmap that needs to be delete

post.description: Create new `feature`. `roadmapId` and `features` field is required. `For Example {'roadmapId': '5e60d05558a01f3c812024f3', 'order': 1,   'features': [{ 'fieldId': '5e60cd2fa731ab3a5b4e87b8', 'fieldValue': 'Title'}, {'fieldId': '5e60cd2fa731ab3a5b4e87b9','fieldValue': 'Start Date'},{'fieldId': '5e60cd2fa731ab3a5b4e87ba','fieldValue': 'End Date'}, {'fieldId': '5e60cd2fa731ab3a5b4e87bb','fieldValue': 'Description'}]}`
Create new `multiple feature`. `roadmapId` and `features` field is required.

parameters.name: roadmapId
parameters.description: The roadmap that needs to be fetched

get.description: Get single `feature`. by `featureId`.  `featureId` field is required.

parameters.name: featureId
parameters.description: The feature that needs to be fetched

put.summary: Add `or` update single field value in feature
put.description: Add `or` update single field value in feature.  For featureId field send `featureId:''`. and features like `features`: `{'fieldId':'','fieldValue':'Title'}`   `For Example {'featureId': '','features': {'fieldId': '','fieldValue': 'My test'}}`

put.summary: Update multiple field value in single feature
put.description: Update multiple field value in single feature. `For example  {'featureId': '5e8322e0cc29454fe5a6a7a1','features': [{'_id': '5e87355c88bc711bdde239cf','fieldId': '5e6107cd46b4675fb6bf6ef1','fieldValue': 'Test'},{'_id': '5e87355c88bc711bdde239d0','fieldId': '5e6107cd46b4675fb6bf6ef2','fieldValue': 'Test 1'}]}`

parameters.name: featureId
parameters.description: The feature that needs to be delete
